name: Glitch & Weasel
description:
This project was part of the RMIT Games 2019 Graduation Showcase. Created by Dylan Simpson, Leanne Lim and Roland Phillips. 

In this world, collusion between mega corporations and government has lead to augmentations being forced on to the population against their will. Glitch and Weasel are a pair of resistance fighters, part of a larger rebellion who are fighting against this dark future.

Our goal was to tell a story about this world through the banter between these two characters as they interact with their environment. 

Credits:

Dylan Simpson - @DLSketchy
3D Art, UI Art, Lighting

Leanne Lim - @jinxy_ow

Roland Phillips - @rolphi_dev

Please note that this game requires a two button mouse or trackpad.
